about_the_game:
In this exhilarating journey, your goal is to collect as many data pods as possible while racing against a 3:25 time limit to reach the star. Skillfully steer your spacecraft towards the pod containers, then use your ship's ammunition to crack them apart. The ship's tractor beam will capture the data pod without a hitch once it is opened. Your baseline score is determined by the speed at which you reach the star, with additional incentives given for each data pod successfully recovered during the journey. Prepare for an epic intergalactic adventure!

This product is specifically meant for those who have read the book "Excitations in Consciousness: Metaphysics Embodied by Artificial Intelligence" and are currently using Choracle AI Factory's Quantum Teleportation Kit. It's an opportunity to show your ongoing support and engagement. If you have not yet joined this incredible voyage, we recommend that you do so first. For those who want to go further, get ready for a new experience!

Skillfully steer your spacecraft towards the pod containers, then use your ship's ammunition to crack them apart. The ship's tractor beam will capture the data pod without a hitch once it is opened. Your baseline score is determined by the speed at which you reach the star, with additional incentives given for each data pod successfully recovered during the journey. Prepare for an epic intergalactic adventure!

It's an opportunity to show your ongoing support and engagement. If you have not yet joined this incredible voyage, we recommend that you do so first. name: Transcender Starship

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GEFORCE GTX 1050 TI or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GEFORCE GTX 1050 TI or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek High Definition

short_description: You are the captain of a starship. You must capture as many data pods as you can and make it to the star with them before your time expires.
